Load relevant packages

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(lubridate)
```

Load in clean dataset

```{r}
econ_data <- read.csv('data/processed-data/final_econ_df.csv')
head(econ_data)
```
Explore CPI data

```{r}
summary(econ_data$CPI)
```

Create bins and new column for CPI_bin

```{r}
low_cpi <- 2.463
med_cpi <- 3.380
high_cpi <- 5.165

econ_data$CPI_bin <- ifelse(
  econ_data$CPI <= low_cpi, "low",
  ifelse(econ_data$CPI < high_cpi, "med", "high")
)
econ_data
```

Explore unemployment data

```{r}
summary(econ_data$Unemployment.Rate....)
```

Create bins and new column for unemployment

```{r}
low_unemp <- 4.30
high_unemp <- 6.70

econ_data$Unemployment_bin <- ifelse(econ_data$Unemployment.Rate.... <= low_unemp, "low", ifelse(econ_data$Unemployment.Rate.... < high_unemp, "med", "high"))

econ_data
```
